body:
by the way
Start an skywalking  without elk index, and the index will be automatically created.
However, deleting the index during running will cause program errors，and can't recover
It would be great if it could recover automatically

Read the documentation, TTL is included there.

> However, deleting the index during running will cause program errors，and can't recover
It would be great if it could recover automatically

No one designs a system like this. This makes no sense. Are you application able to recreate the database after you delete all tables? I don't think so.
We don't provide this, as mostly, the IP or hostname could be multiple. If you want to add this kind of feature, you could send a pull request, and we discuss there. WIll you?

@dmsolr . @arugal 
 Do you have time to help me review this PR? Thanks !
I had follow the markdown How to build project.
Good for me. But you also need to update [the-elapsed-time-list-of-plugins](https://github.com/apache/skywalking/blob/master/docs/en/guides/Plugin-test.md#the-elapsed-time-list-of-plugins).
I don't know what you are doing. If you want to debug agent, read official blogs.
Dot net is not belonging to apache. You need to submit issue on the dot net agent repo. Thanks.
That is not SkyWalking landscape, at least not yet. You could easily use other projects to check process existing or ip:port listening. It existed long time ago.
Yes, I can use CLASSPATH to inject mysql driver. Thanks.

Where do we have the doc about how to use Docker in dev mode? Beside [docker build](https://github.com/apache/skywalking/blob/master/docs/en/guides/How-to-build.md#build-docker-images). [This doc](https://github.com/apache/skywalking/tree/master/docker) seems missing.

> Where do we have the doc about how to use Docker in dev mode? Beside [docker build](https://github.com/apache/skywalking/blob/master/docs/en/guides/How-to-build.md#build-docker-images). [This doc](https://github.com/apache/skywalking/tree/master/docker) seems missing.

Exactly. We should add a new topic to document all of the things about Docker in the main repo, that might belong to another PR.

> Exactly. We should add a new topic to document all of the things about Docker in the main repo, that might belong to another PR.

Could you submit an issue about this? I think this should be fixed in 6.6.0 release.

> Could you submit an issue about this? I think this should be fixed in 6.6.0 release.

done.  #3920
Ref [#15](https://github.com/apache/skywalking-cli/pull/15)
jdk-http-scenario for me
As you are copying the source file, you need this license in [root license folder](https://github.com/apache/skywalking/tree/master/licenses) too. And update the two LICENSE files.
@wayilau Please follow the review, update the document.
@wayilau As you are from CMSS Chinamobile, are you going to take part in tomorrow's Tencent TVP Suzhou event?
/run agent-plugin-test-4
English only.
GraphQL is for query, not for collecting data. So, I am a little confused about your context.
/run ci

oops, just saw in https://github.com/apache/skywalking/blob/master/docs/en/setup/service-agent/java-agent/README.md#table-of-agent-configuration-properties

`agent.service_name`: `...service instance nodes share the same code`

sorry, closing this.

> @wayilau As you are from CMSS Chinamobile, are you going to take part in tomorrow's Tencent TVP Suzhou event?
@wu-sheng I didn't.  I have to Take care of my children 。
I've updated the doc. @arugal @wu-sheng @dmsolr
I'm just trying out Skywalking, so it's just the default settings (H2 db) + an account in webapp.yml for secure login.

Two things.
1. I assume you set the wrong port. gRPC port should be used in the agent config.
1. The login has been removed.
Thanks! I'll check those things. I upgraded from 6.1.0, I took my old webapp.yml file

> Thanks! I'll check those things. I upgraded from 6.1.0, I took my old webapp.yml file

First, if you run the upgrade, the agent YAML should keep unchanged. That is the thing needs to be rechecked. As you were using 6.1.0, you should reboot the agent after you upgrade. Last thing, H2 default if in memory mode, if you reboot the backend, agent is required to reboot too due to data lost. Auto agent hot reboot(don't need to reboot agent) is supported from 6.4.0, you could check the change log.

A simple question, are you using SkyWalking for test or production? If test considering you are using H2, why there is an upgrade scenario.

> I took my old webapp.yml file

Adding auth should be fine, it is just not working but not blocking the app.

Alright, I checked my applications agent config and indeed, I forgot to change them.. so I did.
I also noticed a 1hour difference in times between the host time and containers time, so I also fixed the timezone of my containers.

My containers connects fine to Skywalking as per their logs, and then send their traces correctly:

```
DEBUG 2019-11-24 18:12:52:590 SkywalkingAgent-5-ServiceAndEndpointRegisterClient-0 ServiceAndEndpointRegisterClient : ServiceAndEndpointRegisterClient running, status:CONNECTED.
DEBUG 2019-11-24 18:12:54:229 DataCarrier.DEFAULT.Consumser.0.Thread TraceSegmentServiceClient : 3 trace segments have been sent to collector.
DEBUG 2019-11-24 18:12:55:590 SkywalkingAgent-5-ServiceAndEndpointRegisterClient-0 ServiceAndEndpointRegisterClient : ServiceAndEndpointRegisterClient running, status:CONNECTED.
```
When I had only one container up, it worked fine on the UI side, but as soon as I turned a second one, the graphql replies from the website are this:
```
{
  "errors": [
    {
      "message": "Variable 'serviceId' has coerced Null value for NonNull type 'ID!'"
    }
  ]
}
```
It seems everything is updated correctly.. did I miss something?
I made sure to launch Skywalking before the agents.
I'm using Skywalking for test.

Thank you very much for the pointers you gave already.

Test of time, you need a concurrent execution, this problem will be very obvious. A single execution, may not be able to recurrence。the TraceID Obtained from gateway logback with MicroService TraceID No relevance

How many services could you find on your UI side? 

> I made sure to launch Skywalking before the agents.

This is not required. It is OK to be after.
Click the reload, it is working at my side. But, notice, there is no SLA for demo, don't count on that. This is never being treated as an issue.
If you are trying to open a broken trace, some segments missing somehow, then 6.4.0+ is the better choice. You will see the virtual node the tree view.
English only
/run e2e
I have migrated my DB from MariaDB to MySQL. Now tracing works.

Alright, after checking everything once again to see if I missed anything obvious, I stumbled about other issues about error "IDs can't be null" and seeing the answers that said to check all timezones, I noticed the UI settings on the bottom of the page. 

I believe I didn't see anything on the UI because it was just misconfigured to an old date. I started everything, made some requests and it's all working.
Thanks for your help, I'll try to check all the guides here and see if I can contribute..
I noticed you linked the 6.6.0 milestone to this issue about the webapp auth. Would you like to keep this issue open?

ID can't be null should be ignored by backend. I am sure why you are seeing this. But it is harmness, just a UI tiny bug.

Notice for time, click reload on the page, or open refresh, otherwise, the time stays in the old time.

For auth, there is no short term plan for it, as it is not required, and easily build by user without change codes. I set up milestone for tracking the progress, nothing more.

As you have resolved the issue, I am closing this.
I see. I still hope someone could contribute MariaDB driver plugin
We have the startup script already, and pretty easy. You should be able to write the rc.d. What is the block?
Could you submit a pull request to fix it?
ok. @wu-sheng

why not use systemd to config oap as a service? I think it's more convince
approach.

What  conditions do you query for trace?

2019-11-26 15:38:28,380 - org.apache.skywalking.oap.server.core.register.service.ServiceInstanceInventoryRegister - 108 [grpcServerPool-1-thread-10] WARN  [] - Service instance 2 heartbeat, but not found in storage.
2019-11-26 15:38:28,380 - org.apache.skywalking.oap.server.receiver.register.provider.handler.v6.grpc.ServiceInstancePingServiceHandler - 68 [grpcServerPool-1-thread-10] WARN  [] - Can't find service by service instance id from cache, service instance id is: 2, will send a reset command to agent side
2019-11-26 15:38:28,384 - org.apache.skywalking.oap.server.receiver.jvm.provider.handler.JVMSourceDispatcher - 51 [grpcServerPool-1-thread-9] WARN  [] - Can't find service by service instance id from cache, service instance id is: 2

the error info is above
This is not reboot, this is you have deleted the storage data or using h2 for demo. Then you need 10 mins for agent hot rebooting. We have said very clear in the document, please read them.

DEBUG 2019-11-26 16:44:08:160 DataCarrier.DEFAULT.Consumser.0.Thread TraceSegmentServiceClient : 5 trace segments have been sent to collector. 
DEBUG 2019-11-26 16:44:09:488 SkywalkingAgent-5-ServiceAndEndpointRegisterClient-0 ServiceAndEndpointRegisterClient : ServiceAndEndpointRegisterClient running, status:CONNECTED. 
DEBUG 2019-11-26 16:44:12:487 SkywalkingAgent-5-ServiceAndEndpointRegisterClient-0 ServiceAndEndpointRegisterClient : ServiceAndEndpointRegisterClient running, status:CONNECTED. 


my agent log is above .  
It seems  trace have been sent to collector.
Bug In the Ui I got nothing.

and where is the doc about agent hot reboot ? I have read  https://github.com/apache/skywalking/blob/master/docs/en/setup/service-agent/java-agent/README.md

Thanks.

> ou have deleted the storage data or using h2 for demo

my config is default .so  It is use h2
The hot reboot is from the backend command system. The document is there. Agent can't do hot reboot by itself.

I have read https://skyapm.github.io/document-cn-translation-of-skywalking/zh/master/setup/backend/backend-init-mode.html

I got  the log :
use oapServiceInit.bat
OAP starts up in init mode successfully, exit now...
but restart  oapService.bat
I got no trace in ui . 

Now  I change the storage h2 to ES . I use oapServiceInit fist  and waiting for init end .
and use  oapService.bat   restart 
see the log the table have been creating . 
But It still have not any trace in ui.  I got GET /_cat/indices?v In es  I can see the index is exsit。
But still I got no trace...   
I got the agent log 

DEBUG 2019-11-26 18:01:38:013 DataCarrier.DEFAULT.Consumser.0.Thread TraceSegmentServiceClient : 2 trace segments have been sent to collector. 
DEBUG 2019-11-26 18:01:38:013 DataCarrier.DEFAULT.Consumser.0.Thread TraceSegmentServiceClient : 10 trace segments have been abandoned, cause by no available channel.
Read English doc and 6.5 doc. You are reading the wrong one.
We don't support this officially. You could change the codes by yourself, but we don't have this.
@wu-sheng Please help

this button do effect for everypages....
This feature exists several months ago.
You are posting agent side error. What do you mean? Confused. Please read storage doc before you switch to MySQL storage.
No difference from my side. No special reason.
/run e2e

> No difference from my side. No special reason.

So how do I rule out long response time endpoints
Alright thanks.
I think you misunderstand my point, only have either exclude or include is same. So we have only one. If you want to support both, contribution is welcome.

> I think you misunderstand my point, only have either exclude or include is same. So we have only one. If you want to support both, contribution is welcome.

I have thousands of endpoints here, I have to write thousands of includes, so include can be cumbersome for me.
If the project design allows, I will support both recently
I know. So I said if you want to add exclude, it is fine and welcome. But don't remove the include, which will cause others' issue. Do you get my point?
I know, I meant to just add exclude, sorry, I didn't make myself clear at first
New feature is welcome.
i have the same question,how do you resolve this probleam? @jadezhong
I am pretty sure, you miss an important part of the storage doc, you don't add MySQL driver lib.

Have added into oap-lib

https://github.com/apache/skywalking/pull/3947

Got it.

> Continue from #3822. Apdex is valuable for the service level measure.
> 
> @Fine0830 Please add a linear graph in the Service metrics page and in default layout after #3822 merged(will be short). We will do redeploy on the demo env for the backend. The value of the response, 10000 means 1.0 for Apdex score, the value should be 0 < score <= 1.0, so, you need to divide 10000 and show as float type.
> 
> ### For Apdex score,
> Apdex score
> The Apdex score is a ratio value of the number of satisfied and tolerating requests to the total requests made. Each satisfied request counts as one request, while each tolerating request counts as half a satisfied request.
> 
> An Apdex score varies from 0 to 1, with 0 as the worst possible score (100% of response times were Frustrated), and 1 as the best possible score (100% of response times were Satisfied).

Got it.
This one is good, you don't need a new one.

And replace this one in the default layout, 

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5441976/69702164-8cb19100-1129-11ea-9d8c-91fb61da187c.png)

Apdex default layout could ref the response time's. A avg value plus a linear graph.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5441976/69702216-ab178c80-1129-11ea-8656-5cad4eab3555.png)

I went to see ``webflux-scenario `` test case.
The operationName it collects is different from what I expected, I think it should be collected like this ``method:path`` ``GET:/testcase/annotation/success``  not ``org.apache.skywalking.apm.testcase.sc.webflux.projectB.controller.TestAnnotationController.success``  . 
Because this is what the web interface should focus on is url and method
Can I add a new scenario case？ For this optional plugin

> The operationName it collects is different from what I expected, I think it should be collected like this method:path GET:/testcase/annotation/success not org.apache.skywalking.apm.testcase.sc.webflux.projectB.controller.TestAnnotationController.success .

Class + method name is collected by SpringMVC plugin in most cases. Because of `@RestController`. What do you mean about this?

I mean the newly added plugin collection operationName is ``method: url `` and ``webflux-scenario`` is not the same. 
Together they affect each other
Can I add a ``webflux-reactive-scenario`` case？

> Can I add a webflux-reactive-scenario case？

Yes, for new plugin, you should add a new one.
@wayilau Send a mail to your cmss mailbox, please check.

> @wayilau Send a mail to your cmss mailbox, please check.

@wu-sheng  I received message you just wrote.
/run e2e

> getServiceInstanceTopology(serviceIds: [ID!]!, duration: Duration!): Topology to TopologyQuery

This is not right. For service instance relationship, it should not be defined as topology. The backend should allow query instance relationships when given two specific service IDs. Don't consider it as same as the old topology for service. They are different.
